content.title: The British Museum's 260th birthday #BM260
content.description: On 7 June 2013, to celebrate 260 years of the British Museum, we asked you to send us 260 tweets on your favourite objects. We received over 700 mentions and well over 260 object tweets in a single day. Thanks for tweeting us your highlight objects and helping us to celebrate our 260th birthday.

author.name: British Museum
author.bio: A museum of the world, for the world.
